accepted. Message from VirtualCarolyn: Now I'll start an interactive dialogue. ABOUT_TUTORIALS. Starting blockout countdown...
ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: What type of android app, you are planning to develop? TUTOR
ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: Great, we will be planning to develop an audio recorder. TUTOR
ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: Should we get started? TUTOR

accepted. Message from VirtualCarolyn: ... END_MACRO. Starting blockout countdown...
ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: Correct, we need to create a new instance/object for recorder and choose a recorder api to do so. TUTOR

ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: Ok|Maybe this will help:|You may probably want to use one of the following possible audio codecs aac aac_eld amr_nb amr_wb default he_aac vorbis|Which one you will like to choose? TUTOR

ACCEPTED! Message from VirtualCarolyn: You can use AMR (Narrowband) audio codec using following code snippet
recorder_obj.setAudioEncoder(MediaRecorder.AudioEncoder.AMR_NB);|Ok, move on. TUTOR
